messages.content: Text created/updated with CEFR level A2

Text saved: An asteroid is a rock in space.  
NASA is working to record asteroids 140 metres wide or more.  
NASA thinks there are 25,000 asteroids of this size.  
NASA recorded 8,000 so far.  
NASA still has 17,000 asteroids to record.  
In 2013, a 19-metre asteroid exploded above Chelyabinsk in Russia.  
The rock hurt 1,200 people.  
Asteroids this size can be very dangerous if they come near Earth.

metadata.feedback_text: FAIL: CEFR Compliance. Use of disallowed connectors 'or' and 'if'. The sentence 'NASA is working to record asteroids 140 metres wide or more.' uses 'or', which exceeds the allowed connectors for A2. The sentence 'Asteroids this size can be very dangerous if they come near Earth.' uses 'if', also not permitted. Suggestion: Split these sentences and remove 'or' and 'if'. For example, rewrite to 'NASA is working to record asteroids 140 metres wide. NASA wants to record even larger ones.' and 'Asteroids this size can be very dangerous. They can come near Earth.'

messages.content: Text created/updated with CEFR level A2

Text saved: An asteroid is a rock in space.  
Now NASA wants to record some smaller asteroids.  
They measure 140 metres wide or more.  
NASA thinks there are 25,000 of this size.  
NASA recorded 8,000 so far.  
NASA still needs to record 17,000.  
In 2013, a 19-metre asteroid exploded above Chelyabinsk in Russia.  
The rock hurt 1,200 people.  
Asteroids this size are very dangerous if they come near Earth.

metadata.feedback_text:
FAIL: CEFR Compliance. The text uses vocabulary beyond A2 level. Detected deviation:
- The verb "measure" in "They measure 140 metres wide or more" is B1 level and not allowed at A2. Suggestion: Replace it with simpler phrasing, for example "They are 140 metres wide or more."
